scripts.build:pdf-simple: rm -f combined.md && cat *.md > combined.md && md-to-pdf combined.md
scripts.build:pdf-clean: rm -f combined.md && cat *.md > combined.md && md-to-pdf combined.md && rm combined.md
scripts.build:pdf-nav: ./build-pdf.sh && echo 'PDF with clickable navigation created successfully!'
scripts.test:navigation: echo 'Testing PDF navigation features...' && ls -la *.pdf && echo 'PDF files ready for testing!'
